TopicTitle: Change the mass of the AFSV

Articles.Content: The Atmospheric scanner is bigger than the Mystery goo canister and yet has a mass significantly less (I know that's not necessarily wrong) but if it massed 0.05 it would make balancing craft a lot easier as you would only need one of each with a scientist.

Or, alternatively, keep the mass but make the size smaller. I guess it's a game-balance question, i.e. the fact that it's awkwardly large, is that a bug or a feature?

Agree that the size and mass are badly out of whack with each other, something needs tweaking somewhere.

But making it smaller doesn't solve the actual problem of nothing to counterbalance the Mystery Goo, which is the whole point of this thread. Having a higher mass on the AFSV would be perfect balance, in more ways than one. Edited November 19, 2015 by Alshain
Im into that. I could see it getting a little smaller too maybe so it could pack easier, maybe 20%?
